category.name: wcf.upload.kbimgupload
category.item: Picutres, which are in breach with German or another right will be deleted. The user is in charge for his uploaded pictures. If you submit this formular, you agree these terms and are liable for your uploaded pictures.
Please notice, that design bugs could be possible.
Your browser doesn't support iFrames. Please update your Browser.

category.name: wcf.acp.group
category.item: Members of this user group can directly upload images through the WYSIWYG editor to KBimg.de.

category.name: wcf.acp.option
category.item: Activates the KBimg - External Upload for the WYSIWYG editor.
